glm::max
GLM_FUNC_DECL genType max(genType const &x, genType const &y)
Returns y if x &lt; y; otherwise, it returns x.
glm::min
GLM_FUNC_DECL genType min(genType const &x, genType const &y)
Returns y if y &lt; x; otherwise, it returns x.
